content.rendered:
Elementis Boiler Experts is proud to present our new website. Over the past few months we have been busy working behind the scenes, we are pleased to let you know we have now gone live and welcome you to take a look around.

This is an exciting time for the business and we can’t wait to share it with you.

The features on our new website include:

  • Our new introduction video so you can find out more about our company
  • Our easy quote request that will allow us to provide you with detailed quotes more quickly
  • A help section so we can share useful advice

Please have a good look through the website and let us know what you think. We hope you like the look and can find the information you are looking for quickly and easily.

Many thanks for your ongoing support and we look forward to hearing your thoughts.
